data.name: Sample - Cisco ISE - 2.1.1
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Cisco ISE" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: List Guest Users
workflows.description: Get all the Guest Users.

workflows.name: Assign ANC Policy
workflows.description: Apply Adaptive Network Control (ANC) policy to MAC address or IP address on Cisco ISE.

workflows.name: List Internal Users
workflows.description: Get all the internal users.

workflows.name: Disable Internal User
workflows.description: Sets Internal User Status to: Disabled

workflows.name: EPS: Un-Quarantine MAC Address
workflows.description: Removes a MAC address that you have specified from the quarantine list on Cisco ISE.

arguments.title: Cisco ISE: EPS: Un-Quarantine MAC Address

workflows.name: EPS: Un-Quarantine IP Address
workflows.description: Removes an IP address that you have specified from the quarantine list on Cisco ISE.

arguments.title: Cisco ISE: EPS: Un-Quarantine IP Address

workflows.name: Get ANC Policy
workflows.description: Retrieves details for all Adaptive Network Control (ANC) policies or specific policy from Cisco ISE based on the ANC policy ID/Name you have specified.

workflows.name: Get ANC Endpoint
workflows.description: Retrieves details for all Adaptive Network Control (ANC) endpoints or specific endpoint from Cisco ISE based on the ANC Endpoint ID you have specified.

workflows.name: End a Target MAC Address Session
workflows.description: Ends a session of the MAC address that you have specified on Cisco ISE.

arguments.title: Cisco ISE: End a Target MAC Address Session

steps.name: End a Target MAC Address Session

arguments.name: Cisco ISE
arguments.operationTitle: End a Target MAC Address Session

routes.name: Alerts -> End a Target MAC Address Session

workflows.name: EPS: Quarantine MAC Address
workflows.description: Quarantines a MAC address that you have specified on Cisco ISE.

arguments.title: Cisco ISE: EPS: Quarantine MAC Address

workflows.name: Get Guest User Details
workflows.description: Get Guest User Details

arguments.title: Cisco ISE: Get Guest User Details

workflows.name: Get Endpoints
workflows.description: Retrieves details for all ERS endpoints or specific endpoint from Cisco ISE based on the Endpoint ID/Name you have specified.

workflows.name: EPS: Quarantine IP Address
workflows.description: Quarantines an IP address that you have specified on Cisco ISE.

arguments.title: Cisco ISE: EPS: Quarantine IP Address

workflows.name: Enable Internal User
workflows.description: Sets Internal User Status to: Enabled

workflows.name: Create ANC Policy
workflows.description: Create Adaptive Network Control (ANC) policy in Cisco ISE.

workflows.name: Get Internal User Details
workflows.description: Get Internal User Details

arguments.title: Cisco ISE: Get Internal User Details

workflows.name: Suspend Guest User
workflows.description: Suspend Guest User

workflows.name: Revoke ANC Policy
workflows.description: Revoke Adaptive Network Control (ANC) policy from MAC address or IP address on Cisco ISE.

workflows.name: Reinstate Guest User
workflows.description: Reinstate Guest User

workflows.name: MAC Address Logout
workflows.description: Logs off a session of the MAC address that you have specified on Cisco ISE.

workflows.name: List All Active Sessions
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all active sessions from Cisco ISE.

arguments.title: Cisco ISE: List All Active Sessions
